name: Elysium PD
description:
BETA!! I made this using a mac and it has not been tested on windows yet!
CW for loud noises, cursing, blood, body horror, mentions of cult activity, and death

The game starts off as illustrations/drawings before going over to the classic visual novel style to save my sanity, but, some scenes will be illustrations to spice things up a bit

The game takes place in Vietnam, somewhere called Elysium/Chốn Thiên Đường. It follows Scientist Jim Park for a short time before transitioning over to Officer Nguyễn (the guy from the art book)

Credits - 
Audios from FreeSound and Zapsplat

https://wattson.itch.io/kinetic-text-tags
